item.title: Oceans
item.description: Oceans is a virtual immersive aquarium I worked on with SUPERBIEN for MK2+ and Altarea Cogedim. A total of 11 LIDARs made the 300 meters square video content interactive. As a backend-developer, I was in charge of creating a standalone application that would allow to easily preview the data gathered by the LIDARs over the network, calibrate it (re-align the LIDARS on a 2D canvas) and perform blob-tracking on that set of data.

item.title: Out Of Control
item.description: In 2014, I worked with Visual System on Out Of Control, a sound and light installation in Brussel’s Atomium. The installation is based on an original novel by french author St√©phane Beauverger, and explores the relation between human beings and machines, and more specificaly the question of singularity : “the inevitable rise of the Super Machine”. On my side, no programming involved this time : I was part of the technical team that set up the installation.
